title: PM, Zahid Khan discuss political situation
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 16 (APP):Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif Thursday met with leader of Pakistan Muslim League(N) Zahid Khan.
During the meeting, Federal Minister for Kashmir Affairs, Gilgit Baltistan and Frontier Regions Engineer Amir Muqam and Advisor to Prime Minister on Political Affairs Rana Sanaullah were also present.
The prime minister said the progress and prosperity of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa and public welfare were their top priorities.
They discussed the overall situation including the political matters in the meeting.
